wikipedia_page.main: Henry George Victor John Crichton, 6th Earl Erne, KCVO (9 July 1937 – 23 December 2015), was an Anglo-Irish peer and a Lord Lieutenant of Fermanagh. He was known to his family and friends as Harry Erne.

response: * Henry Crichton, 6th Earl Erne, (1937-2015), Irish peer

* Henry Crichton, 6th Earl Erne (1937–2015), who married Camilla Roberts, elder daughter of the aviator Owen Roberts (a grandson of Marshall Owen Roberts) and a cousin to The 12th Baron Farnham and second cousin to The 10th Duke of Atholl.
* Henry Crichton, 6th Earl Erne (1937–2015), Irish peer and Lord Lieutenant of Fermanagh

Born in Athens, he was educated at Williams College, Massachusetts, and at Harvard Law School, Harvard. He married Lucinda Hilary Roberts, a daughter of Owen Roberts and sister of the former Camilla, Countess Erne (first wife of Henry Crichton, 6th Earl Erne), in 1961. They lived first in New York, and then in London with their four daughters, Lucinda (who married Patrick Lawrence, 5th Baron Trevethin),Burke's Peerage, Baronetage and Knightage 2003, vol. 2, p. 2963 Cassandra, Atalanta and Tatiana Marchessini.
